extensionDescription.message: Disables or enables sending of the referrer. An optional spoofing feature sends spoofed referrers to problematic servers.

title_disabled.description: Text displayed in the title if referrer is OFF.

autodisable_label.message: Automatically disable referrer on browser startup
autodisable_label.description: Label for the automatic referrer disable toggle

reset_shortcuts_button.description: Label for the keyboard shortcut reset button

spoofing_headline.description: Headline for the spoofing section in option page

spoofing_label.description: Label for the spoofing toggle in the options page
